sub_title: Operations I Customer Support Manager | Data analysis | Leadership | Process Improvement | Project Management
summary:
My name is Zuzanna Skorupinska and I help people and businesses to meet and exceed their goals. I am accomplished and results-driven professional with over five years of experience in operations management. Passionate about efficiency I take pride in optimising processes and taking initiatives to  lead projects within the customer support environment to improve customer experience. Skilled in data analysis and passionate about making data-driven decisions to increase operational efficiency and drive product improvements.

Advocate of feedback culture I use it as a tool to lead teams and individuals through coaching and training sessions. Equipped with strong communication skills, I have proven my ability to quickly comprehend and communicate complex situations to a variety of audiences across multiple organizational levels. I am innovative leader aiming to improve things through change while remaining focused on cultivating and strengthening working relationships with key decision makers and business clients. 

Inquisitive individual thriving in high performing, fast paced and diverse organisations with clear values where constructive feedback is part of the company’s culture. I am serving as being creative, open minded, enthusiastic, organised, and hands-on. I have prominent career marked with consistent record of top work performance and achievements. 

Some of my key milestones include:
•	Credited with delivering active functional localised customer support and building high-performing new teams for four European markets, including Polish, Romanian, Czech, and Hungarian.
•	Set up for success four global Netflix partner sites (Greece, Poland, Romania, Morocco) by delivering training on Netflix culture & coaching model.
•	Delivered active functional support and guidance in the incorporation of new HR system Kronos to cater the tool to internal needs, decreasing admin work and automating reporting to increase overall operational efficiency.
•	Acknowledged for nominating and electing "Biggest impact on Culture & Resolution Q2 2018” along with received Netflix Original recognition for living and breathing the Netflix values.

education.degree_name: First year of Master's Degree, exchange year
education.field_of_study: Traslations, Making News, Language and Globalisation

certifications.name: Cert Prep: PMI Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP)®

profile_positions.description:
In this position: 
I was leading B2C Operations in the UK and the Netherlands by bringing the current operational setup and processes to the next level to allow rapid scaling of Zenjob's business, as well as to draw learnings for future market launches. Continuously partnering up with the International Product and Engineering team to ensure the product features and road map are in line with growth plans and market scaling needs. Responsible for defining key metrics and KPI frameworks to measure progress on operations initiatives and make data informed decisions. Developing a sustainable foundation for a consistent B2B and B2C customer experience, owning and driving customer satisfaction, while ensuring the scalability and automation of the internal processes.

Following are my key achievements: 

•	Improved the customer funnel by decreasing the onboarding time from 2 weeks to 1 day 
•	Increased the customer onboarding rate by 30% and achieved the highest numbers of onboarded users for the NL market
•	In a partnership with the data analytics team defined B2C KPIs and supervised the creation of Tableau dashboards
•	Prioritized the roadmap for the CRM campaigns and overlooked the implementation of the life cycle campaigns 
•	Introduced new product features based on customer feedback gathered through panel and user interviews
•	Standardized and documented internal B2C operational processes
•	Built a high performing Customer Success team and increased the team engagement by 37%
•	Created the onboarding program for the internal employees
profile_positions.title: International B2C Operations Lead

profile_positions.description:
In this position:
I initiated the process optimisation, project management, performance improvements, and employee experience enhancement with various stakeholders. Also, I assessed and reported on KPIs to execute daily operations; providing excellent customer experience and ensure the delivery of agreements made with the client. I led efforts for monitoring and steering the team in a high-performance culture to support in attaining the company’s and the client’s goals. I oversaw operational activities of Netflix CS as a team manager for the technical support agents in EMEA.

Following are my key achievements:

•	Delivered active functional support and guidance in the incorporation of new HR system Kronos to cater the tool to internal needs, decreasing admin work and automating reporting to increase overall operational efficiency.
•	Credited with delivering successful localised support and building high-performing new teams for two European markets, including, Czech, and Hungarian.
•	Optimised operational efficiency & Netflix culture by setting up of a new CS partner site in Casablanca.
•	Created curriculum for mentor programmes, including analysis & reasoning and coaching & mentoring courses.
•	Aided training on Netflix coaching model to new CS partner sites in Poland, Greece and Romania.
•	Advised the teams through the change of employers and from an internal site to an outsourced business model.
•	Co-created, launched, and implemented efficiently a new role of Team Manager assistant.
profile_positions.title: Netflix CS Operations Team Manager, EMEA

profile_positions.description:
In my past role:
I maintained and strengthened strong relationships with key stakeholders, including product, engineering, quality, L&D, HR, recruitment, and WFM teams while being responsible for Netflix CS Operations as Team Manager for 40+ technical support agents in EMEA. Also, I assessed KPIs data, controlled SLAs, and deep drove into performance numbers to formulate action plans for improving customer experience and operations efficiency. I coordinated with wide range of duties, including onboarding, training, recruiting, project and team management. Additionally, I enhanced knowledge base and customer help centre experience by reviewing qualitative datasets and gathering key insights. I cooperated closely with teams, such as product, engineering, and quality to collect customer feedback along with translate and review it into actionable insights.

Following are highlights of my key achievements that I attained:

•	Acknowledged for nominating and electing "Biggest impact on Culture & Resolution Q2 2018” along with received Netflix Original recognition for living and breathing the Netflix values.
•	Credited with delivering successful localised support and building high-performing new teams for two European markets, including, Polish, and Romanian.
•	Executed new onboarding plans for team managers to ensure productive start. 
•	Streamlined the talent management site wide process to improve internal resources and create alignment among relevant stakeholders.
•	Oversaw team manager’s effectiveness project, including series of workshops for optimising team effectiveness in eight dimensions, including purpose & goals, roles, team processes, team relationships, intergroup relations, problem solving, passion and commitment, and skills and learning.
profile_positions.title: Team Manager, EMEA

profile_positions.description:
In my past role:
I created detailed monthly and quarterly reports on the developments of market with the feedback from the customers. Also, I sustained quality of translation of localized help centre articles as direct support/point of contact to all customer service representatives with technical research inquiries, triage for bugs, and outages. I led efforts for enabling quality control of customer support, provided weekly coaching programmes, preparing schedules, enabled team engagement through weekly 1:1s team meetings and team outings. I spearheaded billing queries and fraudulent cases along with customer complaints, while taking over supervisor calls.

Following are highlights of my key achievements that I attained:

•	Contributed to company progression by interacting with technical research team for product improvements.
profile_positions.title: Mentor and Escalation Supervisor

profile_positions.description:

I held accountability for managing social media channels through Sprinklr, troubleshooting system, hardware, and software issues, and responding to consumers’ inquiries on social media managing orders, payments, and logistics. Also, I delivered technical support and guidance for French and English-speaking markets. 

Following are highlights of my key achievements that I attained:

•	Resolved all the inquiries coming through via email and phone from the participants.
profile_positions.title: Digital and Social Media Customer Support

profile_positions.description:
At Pollutec (environmental business fair), Euroexpo Lyon, France
- Translating (French-Polish, Polish-French, English-Polish, Polish-English) during the professional meetings, conferences and daily conversations.
- Personal assistant of the delegates of the companies: managing and organizing the transport, arranging the dinners and assuring smooth organization of daily schedules. 
- Responsible for the Ministry of Environment's stand during the fair.
- Networking within Polish and French companies.
